title: 697 - Allegiance | Snooze to Star Trek Next Generation
description:
Dine by candlelight, tonight with Jean Luc, you'll be confused, but you can rest as he is working out all the puzzles.


(You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new websitehttp://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com story starts at about 20:55)


Check out the newest items in our merch store! "Sleep With Me" Branded SleepPhones Effortless and a “Sleep With Me” aromatherapy spray. https://topatoco.com/collections/sleep-with-me

Welcome our newest sponsor Green Chef!!

  • Green Chef is a USDA certified organic company that includes everything you need to easily cook delicious meals that you can feel good about.

  • Meals plans include: Paleo, Vegan, Vegetarian, Keto, Gluten-Free, Omnivore, and Carnivore.

  • For $50 off your first box of Green Chef, go to http://www.GreenChef.us/sleep
